headline: American International Group (NYSE:AIG) Projects Double-Digit Dividend Growth for 2025 and 2026
summary: American International Group (NYSE:AIG) recently affirmed its commitment to shareholder value with projected double-digit dividend growth for 2025 and 2026. This announcement comes amid a 9% increase in its share price over the last quarter, which may have been supported by the dividend affirmation and a significant share repurchase program. Despite reporting a net loss and a drop in revenue for the full year 2024, AIG's focus on shareholder returns, along with the introduction of fresh...
